Test Name: HIV-1 and HIV-2 Antibody Confirmation and Differentiation
Purpose: To confirm and differentiate HIV-1 and HIV-2 antibodies in serum samples to ensure accurate and reliable reporting of results.
Container: Clot activator tube (red-top) or serum separator tube
Equipment: Microplate reader, plate washer, 37Â°C incubator, timer, pipettes with sterile tips, laboratory centrifuge
